name: Splash The Duck
description:
The little yellow duck needs water to live, splash it into the tub with the water!

It may meet some difficulties, such as the obstacle, the seesaw and even wind can stand in its way, use your brain to solve the puzzle and save the duck with the water from your touch.

Features:
* Free to play, play it anywhere anytime
* Suitable for all ages
* Simple physical puzzle game, think hard and let the water work for you.
